Title: Relates to rural ambulance support
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of health to make adjustments to payments for the provision and reimbursement of transportation costs for the purposes of providing increased access to Medicaid Basic Life Support, Advanced Life Support Level 1, Advanced Life Support Level 2, and Specialty Care Transport in rural communities.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-h, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to rural ambulance support
